This package ships a small example dataset `hai_germany_2011` with five
infection types (HAP, UTI, BSI, SSI, CDI) and three metrics: cases, deaths, DALYs.

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(haiexplorer)
ggplot(hai_germany_2011, aes(type, dalys)) + geom_col()

```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(hai_germany_2011, aes(type, dalys)) +
geom_col() +
coord_flip() +
labs(x = "HAI type", y = "DALYs")
```
